medical_history.chief_complaint: Agitation, confusion, and paranoia for 5 days.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 5 days prior to arrival, characterized by agitation, confusion, paranoia, urinary urgency, and frequency. Condition worsened leading to EMS calling. Ongoing urinary urgency and frequency reported upon arrival. Jaundice noticed recently; RUQ and RLQ pain with palpation but denies pain at rest.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Chronic respiratory failure due to COPD/emphysema, large hiatal hernia, multiple pancreatic cysts, diastolic heart failure, anxiety/depression, malnutrition, and celiac disease.
